question: How many Rijksmonumenten (national heritage sites) are there in Leeuwarden, Netherlands?
asked_question_translated: Kuinka monta Rijksmonumentenia (kansallista kulttuuriperint√∂kohdetta) on Leeuwardenissa, Alankomaissa?
answer_translated_eng: There are around 800 Rijksmonumenten in Leeuwarden, the Netherlands.
